result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel J. LISOWSKI was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Armed Robbery, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.32(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: The Court finds the defendant eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program and the Substance Abuse Program after he has served 2.5 years of his sentence.

superMiscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Maintain absolute sobriety.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

No contact with A-Store Convenience Store.

Defendant is to have one doctor to prescribe medication and have one pharmacist.

Provide DNA sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel J. LISOWSKI

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.
The State moves to delete the repeater enhancer.  Motion granted.  
NO CONTEST plea entered to the amended charge of armed robbery. Convicted.
Presentence Invesigation ordered.  PSI is due to the court by 11-13-15.
Sentencing is set for 11-20-15 at 2:30 p.m.
The Court, on its own motion, revokes bail.  State to draft the order.
The Court orders the defendant to submit to a DNA sample at this time.

Minutes.
RE:  A Store, on 09-10-14.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of armed robbery.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 11-10-14 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $3,000.00 cash with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release and that he have no contact with the A Store, 732 N. 11th Street, Manitowoc, WI   Bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
Probable Cause Statement and Judicial Determination.
Minutes.
